Program Listing for File hotkey.cpp
===================================

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Return to documentation for file <file_src_spide2d_src_hotkey.cpp>` (``src/spide2d/src/hotkey.cpp``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS

.. code-block:: cpp

   #include <spide2d/hotkey.hpp>
   
   namespace spide2d {
   /*
   std::string_view hotkeys::translate(const SDL_Keysym &sym) {
       return key_translation_.at(sym);
   }
   
   void hotkeys::add(SDL_Keysym sym, std::string_view hotkey) {
       key_translation_[sym] = hotkey;
   }
    */
   }  // namespace spide2d
